name: OverKart 64 Christmas Mod
summary:
Play as Santa Claus in this new Holiday Mod for Mario Kart 64. You'll need to deliver 100 Presents as quickly as possible by using the Z button to launch them from your sleigh. Your mushroom boosts will help you go faster by using the C-Down button. After delivering 100 presents to 100 houses, the timer will stop.

Help Santa deliver the presents as fast as possible to save Christmas!
